extendedInfo.description: News everyone! Google have now released their own copy of this app on the market ("Google Calendar"). Since they are essentially identical, I might remove this one in future."Awesome", I thought, "Samsung have finally upgraded my phone to Android 4! Let me check out the new calen... waiiit a minute! This is just the old calendar! Damn you Samsuuunnnggg!!!" *Shakes fist!*This is the stock calendar from Android 4.0 Jellybean! Sadly I had to disable a few new features from Jellybean that don't work on ICS.There are no ads or donate banners. If you want to send me donations (via paypal to tdhutt@gmail.com, or via the app "Donate to Tim Hutt") that would be great! Fixing this so it compiles is not completely trivial.Known bugs:* Some people don't see any events in the week/day views. This doesn't seem to be easy to fix, sorry.* Sometimes events don't sync properly. I'm not sure why this happens either, sorry.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thanks for giving us back the classy Calendar app Samsung so callously replaced with manure. Works perfectly, includes the widget, general awesomeness across the board.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Crashes when I try to change settings, and does not sync, either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget issue
reviews.comment: Great app thank you so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notification issues
reviews.comment: Great looking app, far prefer the look and feel to the stock calender app on my phone. The only problem I have is with notifications, which always show up like an hour after the event is scheduled even though I have multiple alerts scheduled for before the event. Not sure why that happens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: was great but lost location click through
reviews.comment: This is very good, clean app, but it used to have a click through form location to maps.....this no longer works, please bring this functionality back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NICE! Especially like that you can see entire days itinerary at a glance!\tXoom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but there\'s no snooze for notifications!
reviews.comment: Really like this as a stock calendar replacement for ICS. The best part is the agenda widget, which blows away every other agenda widget I\'ve tried. I really like the pop-up notifications but for the love of pete, please give me options to \'Snooze\' AND \'Dismiss\'. As it is now I can only \'Dismiss All\' which is no good if I have multiple event notifications come up at the same time and I want to dismiss some and not others! Other than this gripe about notifications it\'s really great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC desire c
reviews.comment: My nexus s broke had to buy this crappy HTC, sense is terrible and nothing syncd with it. Found this devs apps and boom! Made this phone awesome! Thanks dev! Totally recommend the jb launcher doesn\'t fit properly on this screen but all good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A*
reviews.comment: I\'ve come from a Nexus device to the Galaxy S3 and Samsung\'s applications really are (eye bleedingly) hideous. This gives me back the functionality I had on my Nexus without looking like a cheap copy of iOS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: Cannot change calendars when I edit and event. Have to make the event all over again in different calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No leather trim as standard..thankfully
reviews.comment: After purposely leaving the ever increasing wood grain and leather trim of the ios world, I was sad to find the styling of Samsung\'s \"S Planner\" on the Galaxy note plucked straight from a Hobbit\'s bookcase.  Thank you to this developer for making this standard Google calendar available & restoring clean  simplicity at last.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good but notifications are late on sense 4
reviews.comment: sometimes notifications are on time, sometimes not. I\'m not sure why
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Liking the app. One thing though. What\'s with the calendar colors? They don\'t come close to matching my actually colors on the desktop version of calendar. Would also prefer if all day events displayed the same way they do in the widget with a solid bar filled with text.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Events missing from half the views
reviews.comment: The widget is fantastic but i still can only see events in month view and agenda view. Please fix that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need JB Full Version!
reviews.comment: Please add the Full JB version for JB users!  I have S3 JB Stock and i hate S Planner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The help of the android community
reviews.comment: Thank you for fixing a big issue with the GS3. Why do Samsung mess with things that ain\'t broken?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant! Bye bye splanner
reviews.comment: Thanks for this! splanner can go for a hop now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for fixing
reviews.comment: Fixed widget not refreshing, so 5/5 now
reviews.author: A Google User
